mapper.select: SELECT NVL(a.cnt, 0) AS userTotal , NVL(b.cnt2, 0) AS userWeek , NVL(c.payWeek, 0) AS payWeek , NVL(d.payTotal, 0) AS payTotal FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM USERS u JOIN AUTHORITIES s ON u.USERNO = s.USERNO )a , (SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt2 FROM USERS u2 JOIN AUTHORITIES s2 ON u2.USERNO = s2.USERNO WHERE 1=1 AND USERDATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND USERDATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD')+1 ) b , ( SELECT SUM(PAYMENTTOTAL) * 0.1 AS payWeek FROM USERS u3 JOIN AUTHORITIES s3 ON u3.USERNO = s3.USERNO JOIN PAYMENT t3 ON u3.USERNO = t3.USERNO WHERE 1=1 AND PAYMENTDATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND PAYMENTDATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD')+1 ) c , ( SELECT SUM(PAYMENTTOTAL) * 0.1 AS payTotal FROM USERS u4 JOIN AUTHORITIES s4 ON u4.USERNO = s4.USERNO JOIN PAYMENT t4 ON u4.USERNO = t4.USERNO ) d

SELECT ps.USERID AS seller , us.USERID AS consumer , ps.PDNO , ps.PHOTONAME , ps.PAYMENTNO , ps.payno , ps.pno , ps.PAYMENTTOTAL , ps.PAYMENTDATE FROM (SELECT ups.USERNO AS pno , ups.USERID , sp.POSTNO , pd.PDNO , ph.PHOTONAME , pay.PAYMENTNO , pay.USERNO AS payno , pay.PAYMENTTOTAL , pay.PAYMENTDATE FROM POST sp JOIN USERS ups ON sp.USERNO = ups.USERNO JOIN PHOTO ph ON sp.POSTNO = ph.POSTNO JOIN PRODUCT pd ON ph.PHOTONO = pd.PHOTONO JOIN PDORDER pdo ON pd.PDNO = pdo.PDNO JOIN PAYMENT pay ON pdo.PAYMENTNO = pay.PAYMENTNO ORDER BY pay.PAYMENTDATE DESC ) ps JOIN USERS us ON us.USERNO = ps.payno WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT n.*, u.USERID FROM NOTICE n JOIN USERS u ON n.USERNO = u.USERNO WHERE 1=1 AND ROWNUM <= 5 ORDER BY NOTICEDATE DESC
SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , b.* FROM ( SELECT q.*, u.USERID FROM QNA q JOIN USERS u ON q.USERNO = u.USERNO WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY q.QNADATE DESC ) b ) a WHERE RNUM >= 1 AND RNUM <= 5

SELECT TO_CHAR(PAYMENTDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dateDay , SUM(PAYMENTTOTAL) * 0.1 AS persent , SUM(PAYMENTTOTAL) AS paymentTotal FROM PAYMENT WHERE PAYMENTDATE >= #{startDate} AND PAYMENTDATE < LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD')) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PAYMENTDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT TO_CHAR(USERDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS dateDay , COUNT(*) AS totalCount FROM USERS u JOIN AUTHORITIES a ON u.USERNO = a.USERNO WHERE USERDATE >= #{startDate} AND USERDATE < LAST_DAY(TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD')+1) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(USERDATE, 'YYYYMMDD')

SELECT p.photo , s.story FROM ( SELECT COUNT(h.postno) AS photo FROM PHOTO h JOIN POST p ON h.postno = p.postno WHERE 1=1 AND p.POSTDATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND p.POSTDATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD')+1 ) p , ( SELECT COUNT(s.sno) AS story FROM STORY s JOIN POST p ON s.sno = p.sno WHERE 1=1 AND p.POSTDATE >= TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYYMMDD') AND p.POSTDATE < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYYMMDD')+1 ) s
